Set amidst the stunning mountains on the Ba River Navala is a 200 year old picturesque village built in the old ways preserving the traditional native 'bure' or thatched hut. Navala is home to roughly 1000 people.Village CeremonyUpon arrival in the village you will be met by the Chief and your guides.Kava CeremonyA traditional welcome villageHistorical SitesYou will then be taken on a guided tour of the village the village school mingle with the locals and hear old legends and stories of this beautiful ancient village. This will be the perfect time to take pictures with the locals and the beautiful preserved homes they live in. You can then take a dip in the cool waters of the nearby river. You will also witness various activities such as coconut tree climbing and also sample the cool coconut juice from freshly picked coconut. Our comfortable and convenient Navala Village Stay offers comfortable doubles & Singles. Waruka Bay Resort offers a private boutique holiday experience on one of Fijis finest beaches. The protected beachfront waters offer world class snorkelling, swimming, diving, fishing, kayaking and surfing at your front door step. The property boasts 76 acres of untouched rainforest, wilderness walks, lookout towers and is a haven to 5 endangered Fijian bird species. The restaurant serves up a vast array of South Pacific and fusion delicacies with all produce coming directly from the ocean or the onsite organic farm. The bars opening hours are flexible depending on the guests requirements.
